accountId.title: accountId
accountId.description: The Account ID to generate contacts for. This should be extracted from the user's context or request.

contactCount.title: contactCount
contactCount.description: The number of contacts to generate (e.g., 3, 5, 10). Extract this from user phrases like 'Generate 5 contacts', 'Create 3 people', 'Make 8 contacts'.

industry.title: industry
industry.description: The industry type for generating relevant contacts (e.g., 'automotive', 'healthcare', 'fintech', 'retail', 'manufacturing', 'luxury hotels'). Extract this from user phrases like 'automotive industry', 'healthcare sector', 'fintech contacts'.
